title: Need to parse and use the scene message

content.raw:
The first message that RoboCup agent sends is Scene message, and with using that message Simspark simulator will initialize a robot model. Usually only after the agent receives the sense message from simulator, the agent will send its second message that is the Init message contains the robot number and team name. A sample of agent simulator communication sequence can be found in attached file.
Currently we are initializing the agent in simulator only by using the Init message, thus we are not following the sequence of agents simulator messages and the agent is not initialized in the simulator. so the initialization approach should be changed. In branch Nima_Integration, this issue will be solved.
